title: 14A Konstitucijos Ave
overview:
Lords LB Asset Management, a Baltic Property Fund plans to develop a Grade A commercial office building on 'Constitution Avenue', within the CBD in the city of Vilnius. The site is in close proximity to the Unesco protected old town and the Church of St. Archangel Raphael and therefore, the development will be the subject of a 'city-supported' design competition. 

The masterplan parameters dictates a plot ratio of 3.0, and a maximum height of 35 meters indicating a building of approx. 20,000 sqm, with two floors of underground parking. The client would like this development to be exemplary in terms of sustainability aspirations, going beyond BREEAM Outstanding, with an ambition to look at nZEB (The nearly zero-energy buildings) possibilities.
